verbs.description: pilot from the previous flight on indonesia [V: doomed] [ARG1: plane] sent a radio alert the pilot of an earlier flight on the doomed lion air plane had made a radio alert minutes after take - off due to technical problems but they were overcome and he pushed on to jakarta that same jet crashed on another flight hours later killing all 189 people on board lion air edward sirait reuters allahu akbar national transport safety committee flight bali ceo plane bali island bangka island herson boeing deputy chief investigator jakarta indonesia diah mardani haryo satmiko technical director denpasar tenggara
